text: Knema saxatilis is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to Vietnam. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Knema saxatilis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Knema saxatilis
